text: Haris Bratanovic (born 2 April 2001) is a Belgian basketball player for BC Oostende and . Standing at , he plays as center. ==Early career== At age 17, Bratanovic left his team Falco Gent to play for the youth department of FC Barcelona. ==Professional career== In the 2018–19 season, Bratanovic made his debut in the Spanish LEB Gold with FC Barcelona Bàsquet B. On 2 March 2020, it was announced he broke his contract with Barcelona. On 29 April 2020, Bratanovic signed a 5-year contract with BC Oostende until 2025. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Belgian men's basketball players Category:BC Oostende players Category:Sportspeople from Ghent Category:Living people
title: Haris Bratanovic
